description: Appends rows of two datatables into a new datatable based on common column names.

input.name: columns
input.description:
Specifies which columns to be included.
If unspecified, all columns in both datatables will be included.

input.name: intersect columns
input.description:
Specifies whether to only include columns which exist in both datatables.
If unspecified, defaults to `False` (all columns from both datatables will be included).

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable containing rows from both datatables .
